Option 2: Up to (5,2), then right to (6,2), then up to (6,3).

I think I'll go with Option 1. So, my next move is RIGHT to (6,1). Then, in the next moves, continue up to (6,3).

Also, I should keep an eye on the enemy's moves. If they start moving down towards (6,3), I might have to adjust. But for now, focusing on getting the nearest apple is the priority.

Wait, another thought: the apple at (5,7) is directly above me, 6 units up. If I go up, I can reach it, but it's further. Maybe I should prioritize the closer apple at (6,3). Yes, that makes sense.
